item.title: Bandai Namco trademarks ‘Nightreign’ in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/bandai-namco-trademarks-nightreign-in-japan

An unannounced game title?

Bandai Namco Entertainment filed a trademark for “Nightreign” on October 24 in Japan. The filing went public on November 5.

The company currently does not have any upcoming games with “Nightreign” as a title or subtitle, so it is possible this trademark is for an unannounced game. Bandai Namco Entertainment has a tendency to trademark game titles and subtitles ahead of their announcement—in some cases, long before.
